query:
SELECT 
                COALESCE(SUBSTR(target_url, 1, INSTR(SUBSTR(target_url, 9), '/') + 7), '') as "domain!: String",
                COUNT(*) as "count!: i64"
            FROM links
            WHERE job_id = ? AND link_type = 'external'
            GROUP BY 1
            ORDER BY 2 DESC
            LIMIT 50
